Headline: CA, CS, CWA || Angel Investor II Wealth Management || Treasury Management
Comment:
In my experience, it depends. If you are building just another apparel business, a dry fruits business, or a basic daal-chawal trade, distribution is the key ‚Äî but it is also hugely capital-hungry, especially in terms of working capital.
On the other hand, when you are solving a problem in a specific segment ‚Äî whether product- or service-oriented ‚Äî your offering becomes paramount. In such cases, distribution is non-core and ideally outsourced
